:::Treadshot/Hurricane:::

::He was sleeping.  he woke up after awhile.  He felt strange.  
something on his lower body. After expection it was... horse hair?  
Than he feels some blood.  Fear swells up in his mind. He swallows 
his fear and quickly whips of the covers of his bed::
Treadshot: AAHHH! AAAAHHHH! AAAHHHH! AHH!
::The Godfather, who was right outside the door, started laughing 
maniacally::

OOC: Alright, anyone whose seen The Godfather(and most people who 
havent) knows what was in Treadshots bed.  Anyone who doesnt, well, 
email me privately and ill explain.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Godfather:::
> 
> Godfather: I like your style crab bot.
> Sharpedge: Well i dont.  Deemos is our leader.  he rewards loyalty.
> Jetstorm: You guys are both wrong.  loyalty to one leader or 
another 
> doesnt get you anywhere.  I trusted a bot named Deathsaurus.  He 
can 
> burn in hell... we were al pawns to hi-
> Godfather: Shut the f*ck up.
> ::Godfather was getting ticked at this Jetstorm guy.  You dont want 
> to get the Godfather angry.  Jetstorm transforms and Sharpedge hops 
> on, and they fly after the rest of the Chosen Mafia, but Godfather 
> stays behind, looking at the Alliance base.  He smiles as plan 
forms 
> in his mind...::
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Deemos climbs up onto a log and looks into the sky. At that 
moment, 
> Clash flies by. His inner circuitry started beeping the signal of 
> someone with his given out power that he needed to kill. He gasped. 
> Psuedo? That certainly wasn't Psuedo, this guy had a different 
energy 
> signature, but Psuedo's signature came from inside of him, as well 
as 
> Plintissa, since that his scanners detected that one of his men was 
> inside of Clash. He then found Stranato and Inzola, as well as 
those 
> 2 Airbomber and Time Warp, plus that guy that was hanging around 
> Psuedo.
> > 
> > Deemos: Hey! Mafia, follow that robot!
> > 
> > Deemos ran far ahead, the rage in him building as he chased Clash 
> from the ground. Serge obeyed, following Deemos, but Deemos ran 
> faster than ever before. Rizopas and Doom Ice ran after Serge, 
> followed by a complaining Diskus. Mobster seperated into the Mini 
> Mafia and ran after.
> > 
> > Shokaract looked to Jetstorm, Godfather, and Sharpedge.
> > 
> > Shokaract: I guess we're going again, that idiot Deemos has to 
look 
> at something again.
> > 
> > Shokaract changed to tank mode and chased behind the rest...
